{
    "@context": "http://schema.org",
    "@type": "WebSite",
    "url": "",
    "potentialAction": {
        "@type": "SearchAction",
        "target": "?q={search_term_string}",
        "query-input": "required name=search_term_string"
    }
}



/*!
=> Theme Name: {{ NAME }}
=> Theme URI: {{ URL }}
=> Author: {{ AUTHOR NAME }}
=> Author URI: {{ AUTHOR URL }}
=> Version: {{ THE VERSION }}
=> License: Creative Commons Atribucion-NoComercial 4.0 Internacional
=> License URI: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
*/


.m-sponsored {
    width: 50%;
    padding: 14px;
}

.m-credit-footer {
    width: 50%;
    padding: 14px;
}
#footer .m-copyright {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 14px;
    background: #1e2127;
    color: #FFF;
}
.m-sponsored__wrap {
    list-style: none;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}

.m-sponsored__wrap li {
    display: inline-block;
}

.m-sponsored__wrap li a {
    display: block;
    width: 100px;
    height: 50px;
    color: #fff;
    margin-right: 8px;
}
.m-sponsored__wrap h5 {
    font-size: 12px;
    line-height: 0;
    color: #44413d;
}
.m-sponsored__wrap img {
    filter: grayscale(1);
    transition: all 0.35s;
}

.m-sponsored__wrap img:hover {
    filter: unset;
    transition: all 0.35s;
}
.nav-footer {
    list-style: none;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
}

.nav-footer li {
    display: inline-block;
}

.nav-footer li a {
    line-height: 1.8;
    font-size: 16px;
    padding: 8px 8px;
    color: #d6d4d4;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition: .3s;
}

.m-credit-footer__credits {
    font-size: 14px;
    padding: 8px 14px;
    color: #9e9e9e;
}
.nav-footer li:hover a {
    color: #FFC107;
}

.m-credit-footer__items{margin-top: 16px;float: right;}
.o-brand-logo__social {
    float: right;
}
@media screen and (max-width: 768px) {
  #footer .o-brand-logo, #footer .o-widget-navlink {
    width: 100% !important;
  }
}
@media screen and (max-width: 425px) {
  .footer__brand {
      display: none;
  }
  .footer__brand, .m-sponsored {
    display: none;
}

.m-copyright .m-credit-footer {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 0;
    text-align:center
}
.m-credit-footer__items {
  float:unset
}
}



 
/* => Your Layout Styles */




</head>
<!-- <textarea>
</textarea> -->

var disqus_blogger_current_url = "";

disqus_blogger_current_url = "";

      function openDisqus(){
        var bloggerjs = document.createElement("script");
        bloggerjs.type = "text/javascript";
        bloggerjs.async = true;
        bloggerjs.src = "//" + disqus_shortname + ".disqus.com/blogger_item.js";
        (document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0] || document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0]).appendChild(bloggerjs);
      }
    (function() {
      openDisqus();
    })();
